trans-unit.source: Defines the end of a relationship.
trans-unit.target: 定义关系的端。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd> defines the requirements for an object that represents an end in an association.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd> 定义表示关联中一端的对象的要求。

trans-unit.source: This interface is implemented by the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> class.
trans-unit.target: 此接口由实现<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd>类。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> is the base class for the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> and <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> classes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> 是的基类<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>和<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601>类。

trans-unit.source: The example in this topic is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832), which was generated by the [Entity Data Model Wizard](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/423ec9a7-5464-43b7-a7ef-9f5f000848b5).
trans-unit.target: 本主题中的示例基于[AdventureWorks 销售模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)，由生成的[实体数据模型向导](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/423ec9a7-5464-43b7-a7ef-9f5f000848b5)。

trans-unit.source: The following example adds new `SalesOrderHeader` entities to the `Contact` entity.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例添加了新`SalesOrderHeader`实体到`Contact`实体。

trans-unit.source: Then it gets all related ends from the `Contact` entity and displays relationship name, source role name, and target role name for each related end.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它获取从所有相关的端`Contact`实体，并显示关系名称、 源角色名称和每个相关端的目标角色名称。

trans-unit.source: Adds an object to the related end.
trans-unit.target: 将对象添加到相关端。

trans-unit.source: An object to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 添加到集合的对象。

trans-unit.source: <c>entity</c> must implement <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships" />.
trans-unit.target: <c>entity</c> 必须实现 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds an object to the related end.
trans-unit.target: 将对象添加到相关端。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Add%2A> method adds an object to the related end.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Add%2A> 方法将对象添加到相关端。

trans-unit.source: The related end must be an <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>.
trans-unit.target: 相关端必须为 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>。

trans-unit.source: When the source object implements <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships> and is being tracked in the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateManager>, the object being added is also tracked.
trans-unit.target: 当源对象实现<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships>和中跟踪<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateManager>，还跟踪所添加的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> class explicitly implements the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> 类显式实现 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Add%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> class uses this implementation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> 类使用此实现。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601.Add%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601.Add%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If the related end is an <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> and the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601.Value%2A> property of the reference is not `null`, this method throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果相关的端<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601>和<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601.Value%2A>该引用的属性不是`null`，此方法将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: An object to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 添加到集合的对象。

trans-unit.source: Adds an object to the related end.
trans-unit.target: 将对象添加到相关端。

trans-unit.source: Use this method overload for entity classes that do not implement <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships>.
trans-unit.target: 使用实体类的未实现此方法重载<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships>。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Add%2A> method for entity classes that do implement <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Add%2A>实体类实现的方法<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Add%2A> method adds an object to the related end.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Add%2A> 方法将对象添加到相关端。

trans-unit.source: The related end must be an <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>.
trans-unit.target: 相关端必须为 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> class explicitly implements the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> 类显式实现 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Add%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> class uses this implementation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> 类使用此实现。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601.Add%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601.Add%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If the related end is an <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> and the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601.Value%2A> property of the reference is not `null`, this method throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果相关的端<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601>和<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601.Value%2A>该引用的属性不是`null`，此方法将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Defines a relationship between two attached objects.
trans-unit.target: 定义两个附加对象之间的关系。

trans-unit.source: The object being attached.
trans-unit.target: 附加的对象。

trans-unit.source: <c>entity</c> must implement <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships" />.
trans-unit.target: <c>entity</c> 必须实现 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships" />。

trans-unit.source: Defines a relationship between two attached objects.
trans-unit.target: 定义两个附加对象之间的关系。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Attach%2A> method is used to define a relationship between two objects that are both attached to the same <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Attach%2A> 方法用于定义附加到同一 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> 实例的两个对象之间的关系。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> class explicitly implements the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Attach%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> 类显式实现 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Attach%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> class uses this implementation to define relationships between the attached source object and the object attached to the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> 类使用此实现定义附加的源对象和附加到集合的对象之间的关系。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Attaching and Detaching Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/41d5c1ef-1b78-4502-aa10-7e1438d62d23).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[附加和分离对象](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/41d5c1ef-1b78-4502-aa10-7e1438d62d23)。

trans-unit.source: The object being attached.
trans-unit.target: 附加的对象。

trans-unit.source: Defines a relationship between two attached objects.
trans-unit.target: 定义两个附加对象之间的关系。

trans-unit.source: Use this method overload for entity classes that do not implement <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships>.
trans-unit.target: 使用实体类的未实现此方法重载<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships>。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Attach%2A> method for entity classes that do implement <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Attach%2A>实体类实现的方法<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Attach%2A> method is used to define a relationship between two objects that are both attached to the same <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Attach%2A> 方法用于定义附加到同一 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> 实例的两个对象之间的关系。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> class explicitly implements the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Attach%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> 类显式实现 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Attach%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> class uses this implementation to define relationships between the attached source object and the object attached to the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> 类使用此实现定义附加的源对象和附加到集合的对象之间的关系。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Attaching and Detaching Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/41d5c1ef-1b78-4502-aa10-7e1438d62d23).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[附加和分离对象](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/41d5c1ef-1b78-4502-aa10-7e1438d62d23)。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> that represents the objects that belong to the related end.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" />，它表示属于相关端的对象。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> that represents the objects that belong to the related end.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" />，它表示属于相关端的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.CreateSourceQuery%2A> method is explicitly implemented by the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.CreateSourceQuery%2A> 方法由 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> 类显式实现。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> and <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> classes both override the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.System%23Data%23Objects%23DataClasses%23IRelatedEnd%23CreateSourceQuery%2A> method to return an <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> that, when it is executed, returns the same set of objects that belong to the related end.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> 和 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> 类都重写 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.System%23Data%23Objects%23DataClasses%23IRelatedEnd%23CreateSourceQuery%2A> 方法以返回一个 <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>，该查询在执行时返回属于相关端的相同对象集。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> that iterates through the collection of related objects.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" />，它循环访问相关对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> that iterates through the collection of related objects.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" />，它循环访问相关对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether all related objects have been loaded.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否已加载所有相关对象。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the related end contains all the related entities from the database; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果相关端包含数据库中的所有相关实体，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> class implements the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.IsLoaded%2A> method of <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> 类实现 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.IsLoaded%2A> 的 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd> 方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.IsLoaded%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.IsLoaded%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> and <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> classes inherit from <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> 和 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> 类继承自 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd>。

trans-unit.source: [Defining and Managing Relationships](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2c92c097-56bd-4145-989e-16d92475ecda)
trans-unit.target: [定义和管理关系](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2c92c097-56bd-4145-989e-16d92475ecda)

trans-unit.source: Loads the related object or objects into this related end.
trans-unit.target: 将一个或多个相关对象加载到此相关端中。

trans-unit.source: `Load` is called to explicitly load related objects from a related end that is exposed by a navigation property.
trans-unit.target: `Load` 调用以从相关端中的导航属性公开显式加载相关的对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Loading Related Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/452347d2-7b3b-44cd-9001-231299a28cb1).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[加载相关对象](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/452347d2-7b3b-44cd-9001-231299a28cb1)。

trans-unit.source: Loads the related object or objects into this related end with the default merge option.
trans-unit.target: 使用默认合并选项将一个或多个相关对象加载到此相关端中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> class implements the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Load%2A> method of <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> 类实现 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Load%2A> 的 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd> 方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.Load%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.Load%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.Load%2A> is called to explicitly load related objects from a related end exposed by a navigation property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.Load%2A> 调用以从导航属性公开的相关端显式加载相关的对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Loading Related Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/452347d2-7b3b-44cd-9001-231299a28cb1).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[加载相关对象](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/452347d2-7b3b-44cd-9001-231299a28cb1)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.Load%2A> method loads related objects from the data source whether or not <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.IsLoaded%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.Load%2A>方法将加载相关的对象从数据源是否<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.IsLoaded%2A>是`true`。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.MergeOption" /> to use when merging objects into an existing <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 将对象合并到现有 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.MergeOption" /> 时使用的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection`1" />。

trans-unit.source: Loads the related object or objects into the related end with the specified merge option.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定合并选项将一个或多个相关对象加载到相关端中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> class implements the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Load%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> 类实现 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Load%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Both the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> and <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> classes override this implementation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> 和 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> 类都重写此实现。

trans-unit.source: `Load` is called to explicitly load related objects from a related end that is exposed by a navigation property.
trans-unit.target: `Load` 调用以从相关端中的导航属性公开显式加载相关的对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Loading Related Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/452347d2-7b3b-44cd-9001-231299a28cb1).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[加载相关对象](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/452347d2-7b3b-44cd-9001-231299a28cb1)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Load%2A> method loads related objects from the data source whether or not <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.IsLoaded%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Load%2A>方法将加载相关的对象从数据源是否<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.IsLoaded%2A>是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the relationship in which this related end participates.
trans-unit.target: 获取此相关端所参与的关系的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the relationship in which this <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd" /> is participating.
trans-unit.target: 此 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd" /> 所参与的关系的名称。

trans-unit.source: The relationship name is not namespace qualified.
trans-unit.target: 关系名称不由命名空间限定。

trans-unit.source: The example in this topic is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832), which was generated by the [Entity Data Model Wizard](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/423ec9a7-5464-43b7-a7ef-9f5f000848b5).
trans-unit.target: 本主题中的示例基于[AdventureWorks 销售模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)，由生成的[实体数据模型向导](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/423ec9a7-5464-43b7-a7ef-9f5f000848b5)。

trans-unit.source: The following example adds new `SalesOrderHeader` entities to the `Contact` entity.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例添加了新`SalesOrderHeader`实体到`Contact`实体。

trans-unit.source: Then it gets all related ends from the `Contact` entity and displays the relationship name, source role name, and target role name for each related end.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它获取从所有相关的端`Contact`实体和将显示关系名称、 源角色名称和目标角色名称的每个相关端。

trans-unit.source: Returns a reference to the metadata for the related end.
trans-unit.target: 返回对相关端的元数据的引用。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.RelationshipSet" /> object that contains metadata for the end of a relationship.
trans-unit.target: 包含关系一端的元数据的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.RelationshipSet" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Removes an object from the collection of objects at the related end.
trans-unit.target: 从相关端的对象的集合中移除一个对象。

trans-unit.source: The object to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要从集合中移除的对象。

trans-unit.source: <c>entity</c> must implement <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships" />.
trans-unit.target: <c>entity</c> 必须实现 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships" />。

trans-unit.source: Removes an object from the collection of objects at the related end.
trans-unit.target: 从相关端的对象的集合中移除一个对象。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="entity" /> was successfully removed, <see langword="false" /> if <paramref name="entity" /> was not part of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功移除 <paramref name="entity" />，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果 <paramref name="entity" /> 不是 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd" /> 的一部分，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Remove%2A> method removes an object from the related end.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Remove%2A> 方法从相关端移除一个对象。

trans-unit.source: The related end must be an <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>.
trans-unit.target: 相关端必须为 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> class explicitly implements the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Remove%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> 类显式实现 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Remove%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> class uses this implementation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> 类使用此实现。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601.Remove%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601.Remove%2A>。

trans-unit.source: An object to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要从集合中移除的对象。

trans-unit.source: Removes an object from the collection of objects at the related end.
trans-unit.target: 从相关端的对象的集合中移除一个对象。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="entity" /> was successfully removed; <see langword="false" /> if <paramref name="entity" /> was not part of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功移除 <paramref name="entity" />，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果 <paramref name="entity" /> 不是 <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd" /> 的一部分，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this method overload for entity classes that do not implement <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships>.
trans-unit.target: 使用实体类的未实现此方法重载<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships>。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Remove%2A> method for entity classes that do implement <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Remove%2A>实体类实现的方法<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Remove%2A> method removes an object from the related end.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Remove%2A> 方法从相关端移除一个对象。

trans-unit.source: The related end must be an <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>.
trans-unit.target: 相关端必须为 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> class explicitly implements the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Remove%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> 类显式实现 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Remove%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> class uses this implementation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> 类使用此实现。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601.Remove%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601.Remove%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the role name at the source end of the relationship.
trans-unit.target: 获取关系的源端的角色名称。

trans-unit.source: The role name at the source end of the relationship.
trans-unit.target: 关系源端处的角色名称。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> class implements the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.SourceRoleName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd>类实现<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.SourceRoleName%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.SourceRoleName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.SourceRoleName%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The role name is specified by the `Role` attribute of the `End` element in the association that defines this relationship in the conceptual model.
trans-unit.target: 角色名称由指定`Role`属性`End`概念模型中定义此关系的关联中的元素。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Association Element (CSDL)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c305169a-8af7-432f-9ba7-800a163aed41).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[关联元素 (CSDL)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c305169a-8af7-432f-9ba7-800a163aed41)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the role name at the target end of the relationship.
trans-unit.target: 获取关系的目标端的角色名称。

trans-unit.source: The role name at the target end of the relationship.
trans-unit.target: 关系目标端处的角色名称。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> class implements the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.TargetRoleName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> 类实现 <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.TargetRoleName%2A> 属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.TargetRoleName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.TargetRoleName%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The role name is specified by the `Role` attribute of the `End` element in the association that defines this relationship in the conceptual model.
trans-unit.target: 角色名称由指定`Role`属性`End`概念模型中定义此关系的关联中的元素。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Association Element (CSDL)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c305169a-8af7-432f-9ba7-800a163aed41).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[关联元素 (CSDL)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c305169a-8af7-432f-9ba7-800a163aed41)。
